channel.title: How do I lower the amount if xp, my dummys, and hay and door gives?
channel.description:
hi guys, I am using a fr33sc4p3 source, but my training room, that has a dummy (attack), door (strength) hay (defence) gives to much xp, how do I lower it so it gives you a lot less. I want it to give 1.5k every time.
Many Thanks
Music

item.title: How do I lower the amount if xp, my dummys, and hay and door gives?
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Look for the case and change the addSkillXP to addSkillXP(1500, x); where x is the skill ID.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I lower the amount if xp, my dummys, and hay and door gives?

item.title: How do I lower the amount if xp, my dummys, and hay and door gives?
item.dc:creator: @wales_00 wales 00
item.description:
@wales_00 wrote:

look for case (objectid)

and you will se somthing like
playerlevel[14]1000*,*);

change the 1000 2 what ever you want

Read full topic
